https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1QUsZ9sFmLzzqGsCSXXKbVndSC3.jpg Samantha and John Grey find themselves at a crossroads in their marriage. Samantha is considered the modern day 'Dear Abby' of talk radio and as a Doctor of Psychology; Samantha is meticulous to detail and advocates communication as the key to all successful marriages. Feeling her biological clock ticking, she's ready to start a family - if only she could convince her husband John. 2 Years of Love
